verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> A <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> was <S%G3700>seen<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> clothed <S%G4016>with<s%> the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G792>stars.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> She <S%G2192>was<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1064>child.<s%> She <S%G2896>cried<s%> out in <S%G928>pain,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5605>laboring<s%> to give <S%G5088>birth.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>His<s%> <S%G3769>tail<s%> <S%G4951>drew<s%> one <S%G5154>third<s%> of the <S%G792>stars<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>threw<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> who was <S%G3195>about<s%> to give <S%G5088>birth,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> she gave <S%G5088>birth<s%> he might <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>child.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> She gave <S%G5088>birth<s%> <S%G3195>to<s%> a <S%G730>son,<s%> a male <S%G5207>child,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G4165>rule<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron.<s%> <S%G846>Her<s%> <S%G5043>child<s%> was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2362>throne.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> she <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G2090>prepared<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> they may <S%G5142>nourish<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> one <S%G5507>thousand<s%> two <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1835>sixty<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> There <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>sky.<s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> made <S%G4170>war<s%> <S%G2596>on<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1404>dragon<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> made <S%G4170>war.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1404>dragon<s%> was thrown <S%G906>down,<s%> the <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent,<s%> he who is <S%G2564>called<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> the <S%G4105>deceiver<s%> of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world.<s%> He was thrown <S%G906>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were thrown <S%G906>down<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G737>"Now<s%> the <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G1411>power,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1849>authority<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> has <S%G1096>come;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> the <S%G2725>accuser<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%> has been thrown <S%G2598>down,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2723>accuses<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>They<s%> <S%G3528>overcame<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%>'s <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3141>testimony.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> even <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2165>rejoice,<s%> <S%G3772>heavens,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>you<s%> who <S%G4637>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G3759>Woe<s%> to <S%G2730>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> has gone <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2372>wrath,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2192>has<s%> but a <S%G3641>short<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>"
When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1417>Two<s%> <S%G4420>wings<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G105>eagle<s%> were <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> she might <S%G4072>fly<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> so <S%G3699>that<s%> she might be <S%G5142>nourished<s%> <S%G1563>for<s%> a <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2540>times,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2255>half<s%> a <S%G2540>time,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3789>serpent.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3789>serpent<s%> spewed <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G4215>river,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G3778>her<s%> to be carried away by the <S%G4216>stream.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G997>helped<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G846>its<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2666>swallowed<s%> up the <S%G4215>river<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> spewed <S%G906>out<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1404>dragon<s%> grew <S%G3710>angry<s%> <S%G1909>with<s%> the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> away to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>' <S%G5547><s%> <S%G3141>testimony.<s%>
